notes.text: We now support the use of UploadSetwithTable plugin in the Tree Table control
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: fixed Month view layout (320-340px)
We've now enabled actions on the FeedInput control
sap.m.Menu: fixed menu opening when items are bound to OData V4 model
List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
sap.m.Menu: Focus handling for Menu open/close
sap.m.Toolbar: Legacy API removed from test
sap.m.Input: Invisible message is announced correctly
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: header interval announcements adjusted
sap.m.ObjectNumber: labelledby properly applied
sap.m.SplitButton: type announcement adjusted
sap.m.ObjectStatus: retain the minimum height of the empty placeholder
We've now set the width of the File Preview dialog to 100% for the UploadSetWithTable plugin
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: introduce "level" and "titleStyle" properties to sap.m.PlanningCalendar header title
sap.m.Toolbar: Focus issue prevented
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: fix scrolling down the page
sap.m.MultiInput: valueHelpIconSrc is applied correctly in mobile view
sap.m.IconTabBar: Test for flexibility changes improved
sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
We've now removed ExportUtil dependency for file downloads in the UploadSetwithTable plugin
sap.m.ObjectMarker: The default action is prevented now when clicking on the icon
sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
sap.m.SemanticConfiguration: Improved text
sap.m.MultiComboBox: value state error is now reset correctly
sap.m.OverflowToolbarTokenizer: sap.m.Tokenizer is now integrated into the Toolbar and OverflowToolbar controls
sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
sap.m.CheckBox: Wrapping in display-only mode corrected
sap.m.Link: icon is correctly aligned now
sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix flexibility change handler
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
sap.m.Button: focus the button on mobile before firing press event
sap.m.ObjectStatus: displayed correctly now
sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: specialDates doesn't support date ranges
sap.m.Menu: Accessibility improvements
p13n.xConfigAPI: enhanceConfig with conditional destroy
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: toolbar does not overflow when it contains sap.m.Title
sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
sap.m.Button: Provide information about aria-shortcutkey in the button description
sap.m.ColorPalette: adapt visual tests
sap.m.PlanningCalendar move overriden setters in onBeforeRendering
We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
sap.m.SelectDialogBase: UI Flex restrictions now work correctly
sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
